Lyric:
[00:06.540]Close your eyes
[00:08.720]Give me your hand
[00:10.900]Darling' do you feel
[00:13.860]My heart beating?
[00:16.740]Do you understand?
[00:18.990]Do you feel the same
[00:22.720]Am I only dreaming?
[00:27.360]Is this burning
[00:30.400]An eternal flame?
[00:34.730]I believe it's meant to be'darling
[00:40.670]I watch you when you're sleeping
[00:44.760]You belong with me
[00:47.060]Do you feel the same
[00:50.720]Am I only dreaming?
[00:55.070]Or is this burning
[00:58.570]An eternal flame?
[01:02.420]Say my name
[01:04.900]Sun shines through the rain
[01:07.050]Of all life so lonely
[01:10.580]Then you come and ease the pain
[01:14.620]I don't wanna lose this feeling
[01:20.050]Oh
[01:39.230]Say my name
[01:41.840]Sun shines through the rain

[01:51.080]I don't wanna lose this feeling
